meanings.definition: Of or relating to plants of the parsley family.
meanings.sent1: The apiaceous leaves of the plant were green and delicate.
meanings.sent2: The apiaceous aroma of the herb filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent3: The apiaceous parsley danced in the breeze, showing off its elegance.
meanings.sent4: Her dress flowed like apiaceous foliage in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The apiaceous nature of the parsley made it easy to identify.

meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of plants in the parsley family.
meanings.sent1: The apiaceous plant had thin, wiry stems like parsley.
meanings.sent2: The apiaceous flavor of the dish reminded me of parsley.
meanings.sent3: The apiaceous garden looked like a miniature forest of parsley.
meanings.sent4: His hair was as curly and green as apiaceous leaves.
meanings.sent5: The apiaceous appearance of the plant made it stand out in the garden.
